SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Evaluate renewable energy transition strategies for industrial manufacturing, using the SINT framework with Expert Debates (N=3) + Consensus (Step 3B) methodology.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: The evaluation must consider environmental impact, economic feasibility, and policy implications. Experts: Environmental Scientist, Industrial Economist, Energy Policy Expert. The process must include structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis with consensus building.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Consultants: 1. Environmental Scientist: Focuses on environmental impact assessment and sustainability metrics. 2. Industrial Economist: Evaluates economic feasibility, cost-benefit analysis, and market implications. 3. Energy Policy Expert: Assesses regulatory frameworks, policy incentives, and implementation challenges.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Expert Debates (N=3) + Consensus (Step 3B) with structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: - All expert positions must include detailed arguments and structured rating systems. - The process must include multi-round synthesis with consensus building. - Output must include comprehensive analysis with specific examples and data points.
